Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you there? I'm coming in.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
I didn't come for any reason in
particular. I just wanted to chat so
I decided to stop by. Are you busy?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great! Anyway, want to get out of
here for a bit? I was hoping we could
chat.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Let's go.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Ah that's right. <MYNAME>, you're
somewhat popular with the ladies,
aren't you?
<PAGE>
Before we were in a relationship, a girl
in a nearby town mentioned that she had
heard of you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
She was actually pretty cute! Lucky you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yeah, so did anyone ever ask you out
in your old town?
<PAGE>
It would be interesting to hear about
your past love life. Come on, spit it
out!
Don't tell her
Tell her

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, thanks! Tell me all about it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see, I see.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uh-huh...

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I-Is that right...

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, no, no. It's nothing. Don't worry
about it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I know I was the one who asked in the
first place, but hearing you talk about
other girls puts me off a bit.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
L-Let's talk about something else!
Sorry!
Are you jealous?
You never should have asked.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
W-Wait a minute! What are you asking
all of a sudden, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Erm... Maybe I was just a little
jealous.
<PAGE>
You know, I didn't think it would be so
unpleasant to hear. I'm a fool if I do
say so myself.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Don't tell me you're happy that I got
jealous?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I see. It's because you care for me
so much that you like that I'm jealous.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I guess I like you even more than I
realized myself.
<PAGE>
I guess I'm the jealous type, so you
better not do anything that could cause
a misunderstanding, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Well then, wanna
head home?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Y-You can say that... but I couldn't
help it! I mean, I really like you!
<PAGE>
I was curious about your past
relationships. Either way, I only feel
so down because I like you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, I don't care anymore! <MYNAME>, you're
such a big dummy!

After that, it was pretty difficult to
get Tina calmed down and in a better
mood.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, you're right. I'm sorry, I just...

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, I'm at fault here. Everyone has a
few things in their past it's best not
to talk about.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm really sorry, <MYNAME>. Forgive me?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Well, why don't we start heading home?
Let's go, <MYNAME>.
